data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5DIPyCxp4YwQ7kNvgGBu_IN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAVAmgyObCgq181_MmlvoQW5IPWwC5vO89gdz-Mlxji7w&oe=66716DB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FKD8jfht8HcQ7kNvgGH414l&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCT7ENK0OsSKV7CtDHIRjCOHUH1ebF33DQNPVm7QV57TQ&oe=66717B52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1M9OiHf4Uo0Q7kNvgE_uzoH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDSAfF-tEIrFj49uqj9Gg7VTAfZJRYMduoTrTLkEYn7OQ&oe=66716689)
